xqdoc:function.xqdoc:body:
function _:toc($model as map(*),$tree) as element(nav) {

{ $model?project } / RestXQ

Contents

  1. 1 Summary
  2. 2 Rest Paths
    3. { $tree/*!page:tree-list(.,2,_:toc-render#2) }
}

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function _:annotations($annots as element(xqdoc:annotation)*) as element()
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:body:
function _:annotations($annots as element(xqdoc:annotation)*) as element(*) {
Annotations { for $a in $annots return }
%{ $a/@name/string() } { string-join($a/xqdoc:literal,",") }
}
